Web Hosting
This is personal web hosting facility for Faculty Members of IIT Jodhpur.
Members can host their personal website at IITJ server (http://home.iitj.ac.in) by following the steps mentioned here (Click Here).
Thus created website can be viewed at home.iitj.ac.in/~user where “user” is the internet id of the user in iitj domain.

Address
Digital Infrastructure & AutomationComputer Center,Indian Institute of Technology Jodhpur,NH 62 Nagaur Road, Karwar 342030,Jodhpur District
